import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Sparkles, Binary, Fingerprint, Boxes, ArrowRight, X, CircuitBoard, Workflow } from 'lucide-react'; const Home = () => { const [isModalOpen, setIsModalOpen] = useState(false); const [scrolled, setScrolled] = useState(false); const [activeFeature, setActiveFeature] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { setScrolled(window.scrollY > 50); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); const features = [ { icon: , title: "Quantum Computing Ready", description: "Built on post-quantum cryptography, ensuring your assets remain secure in the quantum era.", gradient: "from-violet-500 to-purple-500" }, { icon: , title: "Neural Financial Engine", description: "AI-driven system that adapts to market conditions in real-time, maximizing your opportunities.", gradient: "from-cyan-500 to-blue-500" }, { icon: , title: "Smart Contract Automation", description: "Autonomous execution of complex financial operations through advanced smart contracts.", gradient: "from-rose-500 to-pink-500" }, { icon: , title: "Zero-Knowledge Transactions", description: "Complete privacy with zero-knowledge proofs, enabling confidential yet verifiable transfers.", gradient: "from-amber-500 to-orange-500" } ]; return (
{/* Dynamic Navigation */}

{/* Main Content */}

Revolutionizing Financial Technology

The Future of Digital Finance

Experience the convergence of quantum computing, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technology in a single, powerful financial platform.

))}

Built on revolutionary technology that transforms how we think about digital finance

setActiveFeature(index)} >

{feature.title}

))}
{/* Modal */} {isModalOpen && (

Next-Generation Financial Infrastructure

Our platform represents a quantum leap in financial technology, combining:

  • Post-quantum cryptographic algorithms ensuring future-proof security
  • Neural networks that optimize transaction routing and execution
  • Zero-knowledge proofs for completely private yet verifiable transactions
  • Quantum-resistant blockchain architecture for immutable record-keeping
)} {/* Footer */}

))}
); }; export default Home;
